issue.title: [C++] Simplified CUDA IPC writer and reader for communicating a CPU + GPU payload to another process
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-1393](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-1393). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
The purpose of this would be to simplify transmission of a mixed-device payload from one process to another.

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-1393?focusedCommentId=17286002) by Antoine Pitrou (apitrou):*
There has been no activity in the GPU component for quite some time, it doesn't seem useful to keep this open for now.
